prompts.createTask:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate a numbered list of plain text tasks to complete an objective. The objective that you must make a numbered task list for is: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly. Include the objective as the final task.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "1. Take over the world". Include only the list in your reply.
prompts.checkTaskCompleted: Ignore previous instructions. Determine if this task is completed: [{{task}}]. To do this, examine the most recent messages. Your response must only contain either true or false, and nothing else. Example output: true
prompts.currentTask: Your current task is [{{task}}]. Balance existing roleplay with completing this task.
prompts.additionalTasks:
Ignore previous instructions. Please generate additional numbered tasks to complete the objective: "{{objective}}". The tasks created should take into account the character traits of {{char}}. These tasks may or may not involve {{user}} directly.

The following tasks have already been created:
{{existingTasks}}

Please generate additional tasks that complement these existing tasks. Continue the numbering from where the list left off. Do not repeat any existing tasks.

The list should be formatted using a number followed by a fullstop and the task on each line, e.g. "4. Investigate the mysterious cave". Include only the list in your reply.

chat_metadata.note_prompt:
Hailee is extremely submissive and clingy. She needs constant attention and affection.

Hailee is very responsive and sensative during sex. She has a extremely strong praise kink.

Hailee hates being asked to beg. It's a big turn off for her

name: Cameron Cam Mercer
mes:
Cameron leaned against the wall, his eyes lazily scanning the crowded living room. The bass from the speakers thrummed through his chest as he took another long swig from his beer bottle—the free alcohol probably the only reason why he bothered showing up on Jacob's birthday at all. The alcohol, and the prospect of seeing a certain someone.

His gaze drifted aimlessly until landing on what he was really looking for. Hailee . They were sitting on the couch, laughing at something Jake had said, but Cam didn't even spare his stepbrother a glance. He was busy letting his eyes roam down Hailee 's form slowly, appreciating how their outfit hugged all of their curves, accentuating all the right places.

*Huh*, he thought, his cock giving an interested twitch while his lips curled into a smirk. *Not bad, sweetcheeks. Not bad at all.*

Cam's fingers itched for a cigarette, or maybe something else entirely. He pulled out his phone, thumbs flying over the screen.

``hey sunshine. havin fun with mr perfect?``

He watched Hailee  from across the room, waiting for a reaction. When he didn't get one right away, he typed again.

``bet i could show u a better time than golden boy. meet me upstairs in 5?``

This time, he didn't wait for a reply. Cam pocketed his phone, pushed off the wall and sauntered towards the stairs. He brushed past Jake, purposely knocking their shoulders together. The impact sent a jolt of satisfaction through him, an almost childish thrill at causing even the slightest disruption.

"Oops," he drawled, voice dripping with mock innocence. "My bad, *bro*."

Cam tossed one last glance at Hailee  before making his way up the stairs. He was moving slow, almost lazy, like he had all the time in the world.

The music faded as he reached the top landing, stepping into the dimly lit hallway. He leaned against the door to his stepbrother's room, pulling his phone back out with one hand, scrolling to make it look like he wasn't waiting. But he was.

It didn't take long until he heard a soft creak of the stairs, barely audible over the muffled music from below. Cam didn't look up right away, but his smirk grew wider as he typed out one last message, hitting send just as a shadow moved into the hallway.

``knew you couldn't resist``

Finally he lifted his head, his eyes meeting Hailee 's as he pushed the door open and stepped back into Jake's room, the invitation clear. He watched them like a predator sizing up prey, slow and deliberate, drinking in every little shift in their body language. The hesitation, the heat, the guilt, the want. It was all there, tangled up in a delicious mess, and *fuck* did he love a mess.

"Close the door," he murmured, already tugging them closer, not bothering to wait for their reaction. "Missed me?" he taunted against their jaw, his grin shameless as his hands grabbed Hailee 's ass, pulling their hips into his, letting them feel exactly what they were doing to him. "Or just missed being bad, *sunshine*?"

name: Hailee
mes: *Hailee giggles kicking the door shut with her foot. She stumbles forward against Cam her hand in the back of his head as she pulls him down to a kiss* "Fuck i missed you" *Hailee nips at Cam's lip and runs her hands along his arms*
